General.Name: Shaanxi Lighte Optoelectronics Material Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shaanxi Lighte Optoelectronics Material Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sales of organic light-emitting diodes (OLED) materials. Its products include OLED materials; OLED terminal materials and intermediates; and other drug intermediates. The company supplies OLED terminal materials for the OLED panel manufacturers, including BOE, CSOT, EDO, and others. Its customers include display and pharmaceutical industries. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.
